snippet.title: typhoid fever
snippet.description: (pathology) An illness caused by the bacterium Salmonella typhi. Not to be confused with typhus. Synonyms

snippet.title: paratyphoid fever
snippet.description: contaminated with certain bacteria of the genus Salmonella. Translations acute infectious intestinal disease
